name: Cat Goric: Escape from the Warp Chamber
name_original: Cat Goric: Escape from the Warp Chamber
description:
Cat Goric must escape!

Guide him through the Warp Chamber using keyboard keys (Arrows/WAD/ZQD) or by touching the arrow buttons in-game.

Choose your moves wisely. There are movement sensors in the chamber. So the more you move, the less space you have due to the proximity of the lasers.

Originally posted on https://js13kgames.com/entries/cat-goric-escape-from-the-warp-chamber

Credits

Cat and Portal sprites from Elthen's Pixel Art Shop.

Keyboard Keys by Caz.

Green Gem by La Red Games.

Neon Platform by Deathsbreed.

Game powered by Kontra.

Font generated with TinyFont.

Music generated by WolframTones, playing in a mod from Jasmid's AudioPlayer.

Sound effects with ZzFX.

Images converted and optimized to WEBP via Squoosh.

Sprite sheets edited with Piskel.

Color palette from Coolors.

Code written in Typescript, compiled by Vite, compressed by Roadroller + BestZip + ECT.

Source code

This is an open source game, available on GitHub: https://github.com/felladrin/js13k-2021
